entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:59 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 9:40 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NNE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets late in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
